level.heading: APPEALS FOR HOSPITALS THAT ARE COMPENSATED ON AN APDRG BASIS (§ 29-4814)

level.text: 4814.1 Hospitals that are compensated on an APDRG discharge basis shall receive a Remittance Advice each payment cycle.

Within sixty (60) days after the date of the Remittance Advice, any hospital that disagrees with the payment rate calculation for the amounts listed in subsection 4814.3 or the APDRG assignment shall submit a written request for administrative review to the Agency Fiscal Officer, Audit and Finance, DHCF.
The amounts subject to an administrative review are as follows:
Add-on payment for capital costs or direct medical education costs; and

DHCF shall mail a written determination relative to the administrative review to the hospital no later than one hundred twenty (120) days after the date of receipt of the hospital’s written request for administrative review under Subsection 4814.2.

Within forty-five (45) days after receipt of DHCF’s written determination, the hospital may appeal the written determination by filing a written notice of appeal with the Office of Administrative Hearings.
Filing an appeal with the Office of Administrative Hearings shall not stay an action to recover an overpayment to the hospital.
